definition: Charlemagne (c. 747-c. 814), King of the Franks, Holy Roman Emperor from 800
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Charlemagne's empire, in some form, lasted until the age of Napoleon.
sentences.chinese: 而查理大帝的帝國以某種形式一直持續到拿破崙時代。

sentences.english: Charlemagne was appointed priest of the church to use for editing textbooks.
sentences.chinese: 查理大帝曾指派教士編輯課本供各教堂使用。

pinyin: Shen2 sheng4 Luo2 ma3 Di4 guo2
